00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T compAdd(vecType<T, P> const & v)
00014         {
00015                 T result(0);
00016                 for(length_t i = 0; i < v.length(); ++i)
00017                         result += v[i];
00018                 return result;
00019         }
00020 
00021         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00022         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T compMul(vecType<T, P> const & v)
00023         {
00024                 T result(1);
00025                 for(length_t i = 0; i < v.length(); ++i)
00026                         result *= v[i];
00027                 return result;
00028         }
00029 
00030         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00031         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T compMin(vecType<T, P> const & v)
00032         {
00033                 T result(v[0]);
00034                 for(length_t i = 1; i < v.length(); ++i)
00035                         result = min(result, v[i]);
00036                 return result;
00037         }
00038 
00039         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00040         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T compMax(vecType<T, P> const & v)
00041         {
00042                 T result(v[0]);
00043                 for(length_t i = 1; i < v.length(); ++i)
00044                         result = max(result, v[i]);
00045                 return result;
00046         }
00047 }//namespace glm
